addr: 223 W 79th St, Fl 3rd New York, NY
title: Crystal Nails, Salon Nail Art: One Move Gel Painting (Winter Holiday)
desc: One Move Gel Painting I (Winter Holiday):  Course Duration: December 7th, 10am - 4pm Learn the secrets of the popular One Move nail art technique, now with a winter holiday theme!?? You will learn various types of strokes and how to put them together to create quick and beautiful designs that will impress your clients this holiday season.? Register today to learn how to create beautiful One Move bows, poinsettias, and holly.? Practice tips will be provided at the class.? Please bring your Crystal Nails One Move brushes, nail art dotting tool, and gel paints to the class.? Alternatively, you may purchase these items at the class.  You will learn: * The basics of one move stroke techniques  * Proper techniques for loading your brush  * Design strategies  * How to achieve color harmony * Finishing strokes to take your design to the next level
